conversations.body_text: Hi Carlos Rios,     Sorry for the delay, our US warehouse was out of stock and the latest batch arrived today, we've shipped it out for you and expect it to arrive for you on the 9th.

No worries, thanks for the update!

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025, 8:33 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi,

Sorry to bother again, but in the usps website it says USPS is awaiting
item.
Have you guys already handed it to them?

Thanks again,

Carlos Rios

Well looks like im not getting this by july 9th.

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025, 8:33 AM service@simsonn.com

I mean come on I ordered this last month. Please give the pedals to usps Im
tired of waiting to see if I'll ever get them.

I talked to usps and you guys have not handed the item to them. All you guys did was create a shipping label! You said this was shipped!!! Hurry up ans hand it to USPS this fraud and constant lies are unacceptable as well as the constant regards to ignore your customers!!
